channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游리 12:19 Alarm to Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider that anxiety is still in:- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community-mirorskaya territorial community-Chervonohrigor territorial community
item.description: 游리 12:19 Alarm to Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider that anxiety is still in:- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community-mirorskaya territorial community-Chervonohrigor territorial community#Dnipropetrovsk. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
